name: Firmament (Thomas Csigai, vlqx, Thalaris)
description:
OVERVIEW

Made for the ZenoJam 6, Firmament is a first-person shooter where you send demons through portals by shooting them.

GAMEPLAY

Move w/ WASD, Charge your shots and shoot the demons to make them fly. Aim the portals to fill your firmament bar. Once it's full, you finish the game.

DISCLAIMER

You may encounter troubles with the web-gl game, the mouse acceleration might be too high. If it really bothers you, you can download the windows version of the game to play it normally.

TEAM

Made on Unity 2021.3 by :

  • Valentin Lequeux (UI, 2D art, Sounds, Music) - Twitter
  • Julian Escoda (3D models)  - Twitter
  • Thomas Csigai (Programming, Game Design, Level Design) - itch.io
